data.name: Super Armor Skin Pack | Mall of Mayhem
data.detailed_description:
In this DLC skin pack for Mall of Mayhem, you will unlock 5 new skins inspired by popular heroes and villains.


1.. "Lunar Warrior" Armor
2. "The Bounty Hunter" Armor
3. "Titan" Armour
4. "Destroyer" Armour
5. "SteelMan" Armour
data.about_the_game:
In this DLC skin pack for Mall of Mayhem, you will unlock 5 new skins inspired by popular heroes and villains.


1.. "Lunar Warrior" Armor
2. "The Bounty Hunter" Armor
3. "Titan" Armour
4. "Destroyer" Armour
5. "SteelMan" Armour
data.short_description: with the Super Armor Skin Pack, you can unlock new skins inspired by popular heroes and villains from pop culture

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/ AMD Ryzen 3 or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / AMD Radeon 7850 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Please make sure your graphics drivers are up to date
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 470 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Please make sure your graphics drivers are up to date
